gov.nih.nci.cabig.caaers.domain.repository
Interface ReportRepository

All Known Implementing Classes:
ReportRepositoryImpl
public interface ReportRepository

This is an service class, which is used to obtain the correct address (toAddress) of a recipient.

Since:
1.0
Version:
Biju Joseph
Author:
Biju Joseph Created-on : May 31, 2007

Method Detail

processReports

void processReports(ExpeditedAdverseEventReport aeReport,
                    java.util.List<Report> toAmendList,
                    java.util.List<Report> toUnAmendList,
                    java.util.List<Report> toWithdrawList,
                    java.util.List<ReportDefinition> toCreateList)
This method will amend/unamend/withdraw/create the reports.

Parameters:
aeReport - the ae report
toAmendList - - The list of reports to amend
toUnAmendList - - The list of reports to unamend
toWithdrawList - - The list of reports to withdraw
toCreateList - - The list of reports to create

withdrawReport

void withdrawReport(Report report)
Will mark the report as deleted (ReportStatus = WITHDRAWN). At present it will unschedule the pending scheduled notifications present in the scheduler, by delegating the call to SchedulerService.

Parameters:
report - the report

withdrawExternalReport

void withdrawExternalReport(ExpeditedAdverseEventReport aeReport,
                            Report report)
Will find the external report to be withdrawn, and will withdraw that report from the system.

Parameters:
aeReport - the ae report
report - the report

createReport

Report createReport(ReportDefinition repDef,
                    ExpeditedAdverseEventReport aeReport)
Creates a report from the given definition and associates it with the given aeReport and saves it in the database.

Also it will schedule the report.

Parameters:
repDef - the rep def
aeReport - the ae report
Returns:
the report

createChildReports

java.util.List<Report> createChildReports(Report report)
This method will create all the child reports of the given report.

Parameters:
report - the report
Returns:
the list

amendReport

void amendReport(Report report)
This method amends the report passed to it, by changing the status to ReportStatus.AMENDED.

Parameters:
report - the report

unAmendReport

void unAmendReport(Report report)
This method will change the amended report to completed.

Parameters:
report - the report

createAndAmendReport

void createAndAmendReport(ReportDefinition repDef,
                          Report toAmend,
                          java.lang.Boolean useDefaultVersion)
This method will - Amend existing reports, by creating a new report instance.

Parameters:
repDef - the rep def
toAmend - the to amend
useDefaultVersion - the use default version

findReportDeliveries

java.util.List<ReportDelivery> findReportDeliveries(Report report)
Will find the report deliveries for this report. Note:- This will directly calculate the current deliveries, instead of what is available in report.

Parameters:
report - the report
Returns:
the list
